{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.11395v1", "title": "The frequent hypercyclicity of unbounded operator", "summary": "We establish two Frequent Hypercyclicity Criteria for unbounded operators,
inspired by the frameworks of Bayart Grivaux and deLaubenfels Emamirad Grosse
Erdmann. These criteria simplify the verification and construction of
frequently hypercyclic operators.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA", "published": "2025-04-15T17:06:03Z"}
